amendment.description: To extend the effective date of the Higher Education Relief Opportunities for Students Act of 2003.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1432 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1432 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Enzi. (consideration: CR S8738-8739; text: CR S8739) To extend the effective date of the Higher Education Relief Opportunities for Students Act of 2003.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1432 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1432 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Enzi.
